name: GrokTether
description: GrokTether ($GROKTETHER) is a deflationary BEP20 token from Binance Smart Chain. A decentralized ecosystem that has USDT rewards for hourly investors. The token will be available for purchase on various crypto exchanges and will be tied to the value of the Binance smart chain. As your $GROKTETHER holdings increase, your USDT earnings grow proportionately. A community driven token designed to create an engaging experience for crypto investors enthusiasts. Grab some GrokTether tokens and be part of our community by helping $GROKTETHER become one of the most popular tokens on the market!
